long_description: The GoPro Grab Bag expands your mounting options and provides an assortment of replacement parts for your GoPro wearable camera. Includes flat-surface base plate, curved base plate, thumb knob and hardware, quick-release buckle, pivot arm assembly, quick-release vibration plug and leash tether. GoPro Grab Bag also includes a J mount for mounting your camera on a vertical wall surface such as a car bumper, wall or back of helmet.
short_description: The GoPro Grab Bag expands your mounting options and provides an assortment of replacement parts for your GoPro wearable camera.
